revised_title: Photocontrol of Plant Enzyme Activation and Inactivation: A Review
tldr: This article reviews the role of phytochrome in regulating plant enzyme activities, specifically focusing on the mechanisms of enzyme activation and inactivation. The author discusses the challenges in studying these processes due to the complexity of molecular mechanisms involved and the lack of clear experimental protocols. The article highlights the need for further research to understand the molecular pathways and the role of phytochrome in post-translational modifications of enzymes.
